intro¶

this is code sample for exhibiting the coding ability

import code_sample

Functions¶

load image¶

class im_load.load_tiff(fn, path=None)¶

load tiff image

experiment configuration¶

class exp_param.ExpConfig(im_x=100, im_y=100, center_x=0, center_y=0, wavelength=1, pixel_size=172, detector_distance=1)¶

loading experiment configuration, which is usually provided at beamline during beamrun center_x and center_y are beam center position in pixel wavelength is beam wavelength, unit is A pixel size is correlated to detector pixel size detector distance corresponds to sample to detector distance

Calculation of detector coordinate, cartesian and reciprocal coordinate were inheritant from Coord class

data reduction¶

class data_reduction.proc(im, exp)¶

circularlt averaging 2D data to 1D intensity profile

data1d(self, q)¶

q is a numpy array determine the interested q range

data visualization¶

class data_visual.data_show(d, exp)¶

input process and experiment configure class display the 2D raw data and process 1D intensity

show1D(self, q, log=True)¶

processed 1D intensity were presented here

show2D(self, log=True, vmin=1, vmax=1000)¶

correlated reciprocal coordinates were shown log scale and value limits were applied as well
